Simplify the switching circuit represented by (p ∧ q) ∨ (~p ∧ q) ∨ (r ∧ ~q) and draw the simplified logical expression.
Using rules of negation, find and justify the negation of: (p ∨ ~q) → (p ∧ ~q).
Give the converse, inverse and contrapositive of 'If a function is differentiable then it is continuous' and comment on which are logically equivalent.
